website_summaries.verdict: Quality containers for a low price. If you need storage containers on a budget, this is the set for you.
pros: Set has lots of containers for numerous storage needs, all for a budget price
Even though inexpensive, they provide leak-resistant storage and are BPA free
cons: Microwaving them for long periods of time could cause the plastic to warp
Washing them in a dishwasher might pose the same issue

customer_reviews.title: 40 pieces is 40 containers not 20/20 like others
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Un like other manufacturers this is 40 pieces is FOURTY containers FOURTY lids. Others are 20 containers 20 lids . Not as thick are say Tupperware BUT still very good quality. I would recommend them. Also more of the mid size we use thrn others that give you all these tiny ones you wont use. Over the years of buying I can count how many useless tiny ones we have. Not so with these very evenly distributed
customer_reviews.author: David A. Therrien

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged inside of the shipping box. 13 of the containers looked like the photos. I had to use the other ones because of meal prepping and had no time to get others. I will be purchasing a different set/brand and throwing these away. AWFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Two were cracked on arrival
customer_reviews.text: These are certainly a better option that what you can get at the grocery store for exorbitant prices, but they do seem more brittle than expected. Still, the price was so good, I'm only complaining a little because of the two cracked containers. I don't know yet if they are leak proof as I am just now using them (and will be going thru about half the supply today). So far, they seem fine and will most likely work fine in a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Cm Ott

customer_reviews.title: Basically disposable
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. While these seemed like a good price,I will happily pay more next time I need food storage containers. These are thin; several containers have chipped/cracked after one use. A few lids had the corner tab break off after first or second use. Good thing it's such a large collection, cause they're basically disposable with how quickly we're throwing out broken pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Young

customer_reviews.title: You could find better.
customer_reviews.text: The lids dont stay on tightly and they leak all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amberw

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken container
customer_reviews.text: I have had a similar style of this container that were a little sturdier but less quantity. While unpacking, one of the larger sandwich style containers had the bottom completely cracked out - it was bottomless and the piece was in the bag in the middle of a good stack. It had to be packed that way and not broken during shipping. I guess this gives me an extra/spare top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the same quality as Rubbermaid and a way better value for the cost! I've washed mine in the dishwasher and they all held their shape, so far no staining of the plastic either. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: Not comparable or compatible with Rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: While the tubs are adequate for storing things, they are not the same quality as the Rubbermaid product they mimic. The lids on the large containers do not fit the similar containers made by Rubbermaid. Since they are the same color red, we now have incompatible items commingled together so it is more work rather than less.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Half of the containers were already cracked from delivery I guess when I opened my box . I had ordered two boxes and both were not of quality I was expecting I’d spend a few more next time to get Rubbermaid or a different kind they cracked way too easily for me .
customer_reviews.author: Hlynn118

customer_reviews.title: Leaky lids
customer_reviews.text: The lids don't hold and wont seal after a couple washes. If you have a liquid in a container and turn it upside down it's going to leak. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: Love these containers. There are only two different lid sizes, but five container sizes. Makes finding a lid so much easier, and the containers stack up without taking up tons of space. Haven’t had any problems with leaks or spills. Customer service with this company is superb.
customer_reviews.author: rainbow sheepie

customer_reviews.title: Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! It's sturdy, stackable which saves storage space, microwave and dishwasher safe. The variety of sizes makes it very useful for me especially in the kitchen. Just remember to open the lid slightly when heating in microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Yati Rahmat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and I was really upset to find that one came broken!!
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Gribbin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all, a few of them collapsed in the microwave after only 30-45 seconds, others cracked.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and the lids fit right. After being in the dishwasher they still fit great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica T. Roussel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Although one container was broken in shipment, still an amazing deal! Great fir the ho,idays when the kids steal my containers lol.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great storage containers on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I'm a recent graduate and needed some storage containers. These have been working very well for me! The only issue I've seen so far is that if you put them in the dish washer and they are too close to the side the plastic will melt. Fortunately, this package came with plenty of lids and containers that the few that got melted aren't creating a huge problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Horsman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used a container it leaked all over my counter- a number of these arrived cracked on the bottom. They are certainly not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: plastic food storage
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR THEY ARE WORKING OUT VERY WELL. I LIKE THEM AND USE THEM EVERY DAY.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Poggensee

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: First of all made in China, poor quality thin plastic I would never buy again, giving away to anyone who takes home left overs
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bestenheider

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good for the money, but already have stains in the plastic from making chili, spaghetti and more. I even have washed the containers soon as I was done with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price. Recommended over spending 2x as much for big name brand
customer_reviews.author: Ianjj

customer_reviews.title: Broken cheap containers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered last month just opened it cant return it and 5 containers are broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality than I expected! Definitely a steal! None of the containers were broken
customer_reviews.author: Anesia Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully: 40 containers and 40 lids
customer_reviews.text: Definitely bang for your buck, they are quality container and I don’t have to feel bad for accidentally leaving one in the office breakroom and having it disappear on me! It says microwave safe but it does get a bit soft (almost melting like feel)
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Boooooo!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with these, thought all was good but then when we got to the middle of the package at least 10 of the bowls were broke along the bottom. So imagine our surprise when putting liquid in and all of a sudden there is liquid all over everything. Yeah so unless you want wet socks stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Russell McDermitt

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Will break if you brush up against it the wrong way.
customer_reviews.author: Puja A. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The lids do not fit properly on all, some they do. I would not order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty cheap, in price and in quality. A few came broken and the lids don’t always fit 100% and forcing them will break them. They are kind of fragile but work for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good product. As advertised
customer_reviews.text: My son used these at college and I use them at home. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Box was dishevelled and upon washing these we found 1 broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about having multiple containers broken because of the reviews I read, but I only had one broken container. Because of the amount of containers I got I really don’t see it as an issue. Been using these for a couple weeks now, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes and very stackable
customer_reviews.text: Very stackable. A good variety of sizes for putting leftovers away or for packing lunch for school or work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Piece arrived broken. Kind of flimsy. Found another th her bowl broken later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap. It hasn’t even been a week and have several crack already. I regret throwing away all my old stuff now I’m stuck with this.
customer_reviews.author: lhenman

customer_reviews.title: Item came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product but only 3 large and came damaged the bottom was cracked
customer_reviews.author: victor torres

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, if they're not broken.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these and 2 of the 4 had broken Tupperware in them... I was very upset when I saw them broken. The two sets that weren't broken are very nice though
customer_reviews.author: Stambaugh99

customer_reviews.title: Very loose lids
customer_reviews.text: There is not a tight seal on the lids at all, they pop off very easily. Great value for how many you get, but you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie M

customer_reviews.title: As good as the top brands
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Same results as the name brands such as rubbermaid. Lids snap on easily and keep food secure inside. Here's to hoping I dont lose the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: Broken bowls
customer_reviews.text: Several of the bowls came Broken right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken bowls
customer_reviews.text: There were several broken bowls. I had already used several so I couldn’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. They seal pretry well and so long as you don't tip them over, they don't leak. A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amatia

customer_reviews.title: Lids not tight fit
customer_reviews.text: The lids are not tight enough and can easy come off. Compared to the Rubbermaid or other name brands.
customer_reviews.author: michelle mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: They're indefinitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality leak proof and sturdy, not some cheap knock off great containers
customer_reviews.author: Noah Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product shipping was amazingly fast. Very happy with the choice. If only had a few more sizes. Would be beyond perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bowl
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, shipping box was fine, but a bowl was busted on the inside
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: First time using them and dropped one with food in it and it broke. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Mcwhorter

customer_reviews.title: Good but short pieces
customer_reviews.text: We where shorted all 4 of the smallest containers. Otherwise it was great
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I love the different sizes and durability of the containers!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was better quality than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: D Burris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Within the 1st week 4 of them cracks don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. They’re all quality and hold up very well. They stacked nicely inside each other as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff I.

customer_reviews.title: Broken containers
customer_reviews.text: Right after I opened the box 3 containers were already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are so many in the set....
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers. I have invested a lot of money in storage containers only to see them crack or find the lids broken. These containers are sturdy and wash up great in the dishwasher. And there are so many in the set. In fact I shared some with a family member after seeing how many there really was. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Love Romance

customer_reviews.title: Not A Repeat Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Items appear to be like Rubbermaid containers but are not the same quality. Lids tend to warp in top rack of dishwasher and will not seal well. They also will not click together for stacking. One container had holes in it when arrived and another one developed holes when washed. Much cheaper than Rubbermaid but nowhere near as good.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Weakley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these container to replace worn out and missing items in my set. They are durable and can use with confidence in the microwave. Nice tight seals for storing anything in them. I do recommend these bowls and lids. There were two broken bowls, which is understandable because of way they were shipped. Considering the value and price paid, I do not have a problem in reccommending them.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Haga

customer_reviews.title: No more searching around for the right sized bowls
customer_reviews.text: I really love these bowls. At first I wondered why I would ever need so many of the same sized large bowls but once I started using them I realized how much I actually used that same size every day. When I need a smaller size, I have that option too. The lids fit tight and the stuff inside stays fresher longer
customer_reviews.author: DoItYourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, at a slight cost
customer_reviews.text: These are just as heavy as Rubbermaid, but way less expensive. On that note, I've noticed that the lids don't fit tightly on the smaller ones. Larger ones seem fine. Probably would be a good idea to put a heavy rubber band on the smaller ones to keep the lid secure...
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Set
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the bowls are thin and you cannot reheat anything in the microwave in them. The lids distort and they are very brittle. Ive thrown away 5 bowls already.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Cates

customer_reviews.title: this has a zero value
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaply made product, Do not waste your time and order this product. You'll just turn around and return them.
customer_reviews.author: cruzing

customer_reviews.title: not very durable
customer_reviews.text: not very happy with product its a cheap plastic and 4 of my containers were broken when I opened the box not satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical cause it was such an amazing price but it really is durable and lean proof. Now if there was a away to not lose lids lol
customer_reviews.author: Greene

customer_reviews.title: These containers cost like 2.60-3.00 each at the grocery store. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Buy them, you will save yoursrlf a ton if money at lunchtime
customer_reviews.author: steve alexandris

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product . Sadly this time more than half of my containers came broken.
customer_reviews.author: F. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for food storage
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for keeping food fresh in the refrigerator or freezer and can go straight to the microwave. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Nell Passman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty heave duty, not super light weight dollar store type - come with a ton of bowls. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: they come in a big box
customer_reviews.text: exactly as shown. fast shipping. would recomend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: kathy hubbard

product_meta.title: Utopia Kitchen 80 Piece Plastic Food Storage Container Set [40 Container and 40 Lids]

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars445 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
